subject: English
goals: Understand the basic parts of speech in English grammar and their usages, including nouns, pronouns, verbs, adjectives, and adverbs.
milestones: Be able to identify and utilize each part of speech in simple sentences. Complete a quiz on parts of speech with a passing score by the end of the week.

learning_tasks.task: Review the definitions and examples of nouns, pronouns, verbs, adjectives, and adverbs.

practice_tasks.task: Complete a worksheet identifying parts of speech in given sentences.
Take a short online quiz on parts of speech.

resources: Recommended grammar textbook chapter on parts of speech, online resources such as Grammarly for practice quizzes, and Khan Academy's videos on parts of speech.
